name: qwtpolar

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The QwtPolar library contains classes for displaying values on a polar
coordinate system.

dependencies.name: qmake
dependencies.description:
Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) is an XML-based language for describing
two-dimensional vector graphics. Qt provides classes for rendering and
displaying SVG drawings in widgets and on other paint devices.

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: qwt
dependencies.description:
The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are
primarily useful for programs with a technical background. Beside a
framework for 2D plots it provides scales, sliders, dials, compasses,
thermometers, wheels and knobs to control or display values, arrays, or
ranges of type double.

dependent_to.name: qgis
dependent_to.description:
QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.
